```{r load data}

dms_spaced <- paste0(substring(dms, 1, 2),
       " ",
       substring(dms, 3, 4),
       " ",
       substring(dms, 5, 6),
       ".",
       substring(dms, 7, 8))

conv_unit(dms_spaced, "deg_min_sec", "dec_deg")
```
